org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.io.readers.def
Class AeBaseDefReader

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.io.readers.def.AeBaseDefReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeBpelDefReader
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeDispatchReader
public abstract class AeBaseDefReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeBpelDefReader

Simple base class for AeDef object readers. Subclasses provide behavior for creating AeDef object impls and configuring them appropriately.

Constructor Summary

It is expected that reader impls will extract attribute (and possibly other) data from element to set properties on the new def object and then add it to its parent in the appropriate manner.
